events.message: I recently received my order but I would like to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied with it.
The customer's message contains keywords related to refund, so the case is categorized under the Refund cluster.
Assignment of the case to the refund support agent team to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I am here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and explain the reason you are requesting the refund in detail?
My order number is 123456789. The product color was different than shown in the pictures, and it feels very cheap compared to what was advertised.
Thank you for the details. I can initiate a full refund for your purchase. Please return the item using the prepaid shipping label we'll send you shortly.
That solution works for me, thank you. I will send the item back as soon as I receive the label.
The refund process has been initiated. You will receive the prepaid return shipping label via email within the next hour.
We are reaching out to confirm that we have received your returned product and your refund has been successfully processed. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Your refund case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and please contact us again if you have any future questions or concerns.
